verses.verse: For, behold, in those days<WH3117>, and in that time<WH6256>, when I shall bring again<WH7725><WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem<WH3389>,

I will also gather<WH6908> all nations<WH1471>, and will bring them down<WH3381> into the valley<WH6010> of Jehoshaphat<WH3092>, and will plead<WH8199> with them there for my people<WH5971> and for my heritage<WH5159> Israel<WH3478>, whom they have scattered<WH6340> among the nations<WH1471>, and parted<WH2505> my land<WH776>.

And they have cast<WH3032> lots<WH1486> for my people<WH5971>; and have given<WH5414> a boy<WH3206> for an harlot<WH2181>, and sold<WH4376> a girl<WH3207> for wine<WH3196>, that they might drink<WH8354>.

Yea, and what have ye to do with me, O Tyre<WH6865>, and Zidon<WH6721>, and all the coasts<WH1552> of Palestine<WH6429>? will ye render<WH7999> me a recompence<WH1576>? and if ye recompense<WH1580> me, swiftly<WH7031> and speedily<WH4120> will I return<WH7725> your recompence<WH1576> upon your own head<WH7218>;
Because ye have taken<WH3947> my silver<WH3701> and my gold<WH2091>, and have carried<WH935> into your temples<WH1964> my goodly<WH2896> pleasant things<WH4261>:

The children<WH1121> also of Judah<WH3063> and the children<WH1121> of Jerusalem<WH3389> have ye sold<WH4376> unto the Grecians<WH3125><WH1121>, that ye might remove them far<WH7368> from their border<WH1366>.
Behold, I will raise<WH5782> them out of the place<WH4725> whither ye have sold<WH4376> them, and will return<WH7725> your recompence<WH1576> upon your own head<WH7218>:

And I will sell<WH4376> your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> into the hand<WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>, and they shall sell<WH4376> them to the Sabeans<WH7615>, to a people<WH1471> far off<WH7350>: for the LORD<WH3068> hath spoken<WH1696> it.

¶ Proclaim<WH7121> ye this among the Gentiles<WH1471>; Prepare<WH6942> war<WH4421>, wake up<WH5782> the mighty men<WH1368>, let all the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> draw near<WH5066>; let them come up<WH5927>:
Beat<WH3807> your plowshares<WH855> into swords<WH2719>, and your pruninghooks<WH4211> into spears<WH7420>: let the weak<WH2523> say<WH559>, I am strong<WH1368>.

Assemble<WH5789> yourselves, and come<WH935>, all ye heathen<WH1471>, and gather yourselves together<WH6908> round about<WH5439>: thither cause thy mighty ones<WH1368> to come down<WH5181>, O LORD<WH3068>.

Let the heathen<WH1471> be wakened<WH5782>, and come up<WH5927> to the valley<WH6010> of Jehoshaphat<WH3092>: for there will I sit<WH3427> to judge<WH8199> all the heathen<WH1471> round about<WH5439>.

Put<WH7971> ye in the sickle<WH4038>, for the harvest<WH7105> is ripe<WH1310>: come<WH935>, get you down<WH3381>; for the press<WH1660> is full<WH4390>, the fats<WH3342> overflow<WH7783>; for their wickedness<WH7451> is great<WH7227>.
Multitudes<WH1995>, multitudes<WH1995> in the valley<WH6010> of decision<WH2742>: for the day<WH3117> of the LORD<WH3068> is near<WH7138> in the valley<WH6010> of decision<WH2742>.
The sun<WH8121> and the moon<WH3394> shall be darkened<WH6937>, and the stars<WH3556> shall withdraw<WH622> their shining<WH5051>.

The LORD<WH3068> also shall roar<WH7580> out of Zion<WH6726>, and utter<WH5414> his voice<WH6963> from Jerusalem<WH3389>; and the heavens<WH8064> and the earth<WH776> shall shake<WH7493>: but the LORD<WH3068> will be the hope<WH4268> of his people<WH5971>, and the strength<WH4581> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

So shall ye know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> dwelling<WH7931> in Zion<WH6726>, my holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>: then shall Jerusalem<WH3389> be holy<WH6944>, and there shall no strangers<WH2114> pass through<WH5674> her any more.

¶ And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that the mountains<WH2022> shall drop down<WH5197> new wine<WH6071>, and the hills<WH1389> shall flow<WH3212> with milk<WH2461>, and all the rivers<WH650> of Judah<WH3063> shall flow<WH3212> with waters<WH4325>, and a fountain<WH4599> shall come forth<WH3318> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068>, and shall water<WH8248> the valley<WH5158> of Shittim<WH7851>.

Egypt<WH4714> shall be a desolation<WH8077>, and Edom<WH123> shall be a desolate<WH8077> wilderness<WH4057>, for the violence<WH2555> against the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>, because they have shed<WH8210> innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> in their land<WH776>.
But Judah<WH3063> shall dwell<WH3427> for ever<WH5769>, and Jerusalem<WH3389> from generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755>.
For I will cleanse<WH5352> their blood<WH1818> that I have not cleansed<WH5352>: for the LORD<WH3068> dwelleth<WH7931> in Zion<WH6726>.
